name: Out of controls (Blukulele)
description:
🚀  🚀  🚀

Controls are getting weird in space!

Controls :

Shoot those ghosts and stay alive during 10 waves! 

  • Up arrow to shoot up
  • Left arrow to shoot left
  • Down arrow to shoot down
  • Right arrow to shoot right

But careful! Your spaceship is turning around!

Where is left ? Where is up ? You don't have time to think about it, they're already here!

A game made in 3 hours for the Trijam #121. The theme was "Things are getting weird". Hope you like it!


Music by Alumo : alumo.bandcamp.com

🚀  🚀  🚀
